department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: UV-Visible Spectrophotometer with Xenon flash lamp and Multi-channel pipette accessory with associated locking tips
description: Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC), Summerland Research and Development Centre (SuRDC), Summerland, BC., require the supply and delivery of one (1) UV-Visible Spectrophotometer with Xenon flash lamp and (1) Multi-channel pipette accessory with associated locking tips.
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement**
===============

**Reference Number:** WS4264090918

**Title (English/French):** 01550-240449 - Spectrophotometer / Spectrophotomètre

**Announcement Date:** October 20, 2023

**Closing Date and Time:** November 14, 2023, at 2:00 p.m. (PST)

**Summary**
--------

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) is seeking to procure one (1) UV-Visible Spectrophotometer with a Xenon flash lamp and one (1) Multi-channel pipette accessory with associated locking tips.

**Procurement Details**
-------------------

* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
* **Method of Procurement:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Region of Opportunity:** British Columbia
* **Region of Delivery:** Same as above

**Contracting Entity**
--------------------

* **Name (English/French):** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) / Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
* **Address:**

    11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
    Gatineau, QC
    K1A 0S5

**Contact Information**
-----------------------

* **Name:** Samantha Phelan (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email:** [samantha.phelan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:samantha.phelan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Phone:** None

**Instructions for Tenderers**
---------------------------

Tenderers must submit their proposals electronically through the Ariba Discovery portal. The tender closing date and time are absolute. Late submissions will not be accepted.

**Notice URL**
------------

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17784358?extsite=MTc3ODQzNThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
